data.title: Pre Match Events
data.meta_description: The West Ham Way Pre Match Event Join Dave Walker, ExWHUemployee, and your brand new host ‚Äì ‚ÄòMad Dog‚Äô Martin Allen ‚Äì as we‚Äôre joined by your favourite West Ham heroes and legends for a live Q&A. We are delighted to announce that we have moved our popular events to a brand new location for...
data.text:
We are delighted to announce that we have another legend and fan returning as out guest for this event. This will be our 8th event at our new venue before the Luton Town match on the 11th May at 11am-2pm.

We are over the moon to welcome our all time 5th highest goalscorer with an impressive 146 goals over two spells for the club, Tony Cottee. Tony Cottee was a boyhood supporter who attended the 1980 Cup Final as a fan and then went on to make his debut for the club on the 1st of January 1983 scoring against rivals Spurs. He went on to play another 212 for the club before joining Everton for a British transfer fee record at the time of ¬£2.2m. During that time he and Frank McAvennie formed a great partnership which helped the club achieve our greatest ever league position of 3rd in1986. Cottee then returned for a second spell from Everton in 1994 and played until 1996 scoring a further 23 league goals for us before joining Selangor in Malaysia. During his time time at the club Cottee also represented England.

Same format! ‚Äì BIGGER & BETTER value & venue

üéâ Exciting News for West Ham Fans!

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that we‚Äôve found the perfect new home for our legendary pre-match events ‚Äì right next to the London Stadium! Say hello to The Colour Factory, conveniently located next door to Hackney Wick station. This is where the magic happens, and we can‚Äôt wait to welcome you all.

Here‚Äôs what you can expect at our new venue:

üçªAffordable Drinks: We‚Äôve got great news for your wallet! Enjoy your favorite brews, including Lager, for just ¬£5 per pint. We believe in keeping your thirst quenched without breaking the bank.

üéâ Spectacular Production: Brace yourself for an amazing production and stage show featuring ex-players and club legends. These West Ham icons will bring you closer to the heart and soul of our beloved team.

üçî Delicious Dining: Hungry before the match? No problem! We‚Äôve got tasty food options available right on-site, including a delectable vegan choice for those with a more plant-based palate.

üí∫ Ample Seating: Worried about finding a comfortable spot to relax? Don‚Äôt be! We‚Äôve got plenty of seating in both our general admission and VIP areas. Whether you prefer mingling with fellow fans or lounging in a more exclusive setting, we‚Äôve got you covered.

üçª Fantastic Atmosphere: Experience the pre-match buzz like never before. The Colour Factory boasts spacious outdoor areas, large bars stocked with an extensive range of beverages, and state-of-the-art screens and sound systems. It‚Äôs the ultimate destination for West Ham fans!

üö∂ Convenient Location: Just a quick 10-minute walk from the stadium, The Colour Factory is your go-to spot before the big match.

üî¥ Legacy Events: We‚Äôre proud to continue the tradition of our immensely popular events, which started at the East Ham Working Man‚Äôs club and continued at O‚ÄôNeil‚Äôs in Leytonstone.

üôå Exclusive Benefits: We‚Äôre extending a warm welcome to all members of the West Ham Supporters Club. Members will enjoy a fantastic ¬£5 discount on their entrance fee, as will our loyal Patreons.

Patreons please leave your names under the patreon post and pay your ¬£10/¬£35 on the door. Ultra Patreons get in free on the house or pay ¬£25 for VIP entry but please also put your names down on the patreon post. Any guests of patreons will need to buy their tickets from this page.

Here‚Äôs a sneak peek at our event packages:

üí• Standard Package: ¬£15 entrance fee (Free for Ultra Patreons, ¬£10 for Patreons, Supporters Club members, and children). You‚Äôll have access to a wide range of reasonably priced drinks, engaging Q&A sessions, thrilling raffles and auctions, and a soundtrack of West Ham-themed music and DVDs.

ü•Ç Inclusive Package: For just ¬£40 (¬£35 for Supporters Club and Patreons, and ¬£10 for kids, ¬£25 for Ultra Patreons), you‚Äôll receive all the standard perks plus your very own VIP room complete with a private bar and restroom. The highlight, of course, is the all-inclusive bar with a selection of beverages to enjoy in an exclusive setting.

üé§ Meet Our Host: The charismatic Martin Allen, aka ‚ÄúMad Dog,‚Äù will be our host. With six years at the club (1989-1995) and 190 appearances with 25 remarkable goals, Martin is the perfect host for these events. His humor and personal touch make our events truly special.

We‚Äôre confident that The Colour Factory will be THE spot for all West Ham fans to gather before the match. Whether you‚Äôve attended our previous events or are a first-time guest, we can‚Äôt wait to welcome you. Get ready for unforgettable moments, and let‚Äôs cheer on our beloved West Ham together! ‚öíÔ∏èüôå #COYI
